column1:
2/2 The Wuhan coronavirus began in China thus it is Chinese coronavirus. The name is linked to it's point of origen. Like the Spanish Flu, West Nile virus, MERS virus for the Middle Eastern virus
Why the contention about this coronavirus being called by its point of origin?
